mapper.select: select project.project_id as id, nation, province, city, coordinate, project_name as projectName, project_type as projectType, project_introduction as projectIntroduction, thumbnail, json_path as jsonPath, construction_status as constructionStatus, detail_image as detailImage, domestic_company as domesticCompany from public.br_project project, public.br_construction_site construction_site, public.br_project_site project_site where project.project_id = project_site.project_id and construction_site.location_id = project_site.location_id
